translation.catalog-access-hero-subtitle: Find the perfect way to access our collection of artisanal apps‚Äîwe're here to help you choose what works best for you. From single tool licenses to all-access memberships, there's an option that fits your needs.
translation.catalog-access-single-tool-description: Lifetime access to one finished artisanal app with updates. Pricing and payment model (one-time or subscription) vary by tool based on complexity and features.
translation.catalog-access-all-tools-description: Unlock every catalog app and private release notes. Price may increase over time as the catalog grows. New pricing will always be communicated prior to implementation.
translation.catalog-access-supporter-description: All-Tools perks plus the ability to propose your own features. Your support directly fuels our growth and supports independent artisanal development, enabling us to expand the catalog and develop new tools faster.
translation.payment-method-invoice-tooltip: Payment via bank transfer with QR-bill (1-3 business days)
translation.payment-method-invoice-inperson-tooltip: In-person sessions: Bank transfer with QR-bill (1-3 days)
translation.payment-method-info-both: üí≥ Remote: Stripe (instant) ‚Ä¢ üìÑ In-person: Invoice with QR-bill (1-3 days) ‚Ä¢ Payment method selected during booking
translation.catalog-access-benefit-1-text: Once you purchase a tool, you have lifetime access. No recurring fees for single tool licenses.
translation.catalog-access-benefit-2-text: All tools receive regular updates and improvements. Members get priority access to new features.
translation.catalog-access-benefit-3-text: Join a community of users and provide feedback that shapes the future of our tools.
translation.catalog-access-faq-1-question: How do I purchase a Single Tool License?
translation.catalog-access-faq-1-answer: When our booking system is ready, you'll be able to browse our catalog, select a tool, and purchase a one-time license. The price varies by tool (CHF 2-25) based on complexity and features.
translation.catalog-access-faq-2-question: Can I upgrade from Single Tool to All-Tools Membership?
translation.catalog-access-faq-2-answer: Yes! You can upgrade at any time. We'll credit your single tool purchase toward your membership. Reach out through our support page‚Äîwe're here to help you find the best option for your needs.
translation.catalog-access-faq-3-question: What happens if I cancel my subscription?
translation.catalog-access-faq-3-answer: You'll retain access until the end of your billing period. After cancellation, you'll lose access to tools you haven't purchased individually. Single tool licenses remain active forever.
translation.catalog-access-faq-4-question: Do I get refunds for unused time?
translation.catalog-access-faq-4-answer: We don't offer refunds for unused subscription time, but you can cancel at any time and retain access until the end of your billing period. Single tool licenses are final purchases with lifetime access.
translation.catalog-access-faq-5-question: How do I access my purchased tools?
translation.catalog-access-faq-5-answer: Once you purchase a tool or subscription, you'll receive access instructions via email. You can also access your tools from your account dashboard on bitminded.ch.
translation.catalog-access-faq-6-question: Can I switch between monthly and yearly billing?
translation.catalog-access-faq-6-answer: Yes, you can switch your billing cycle at any time from your account settings. Switching to yearly billing saves you 17% compared to monthly billing.
translation.catalog-access-faq-7-question: What's included in the Supporter Tier guidance calls?
translation.catalog-access-faq-7-answer: Supporter Tier members receive one 30-minute guidance call per quarter. These calls can cover tech questions, tool usage, digital wellbeing, or any topic related to our services. You'll also receive quarterly behind-the-scenes sessions about upcoming features and developments.
translation.catalog-access-cta-description: Our booking system is coming soon. In the meantime, check out our catalog or reach out through our support page‚Äîwe're here to help and answer any questions.
translation.catalog-access-features-info-description: Learn about what each feature includes and compare which pricing tiers include them. Check the indicators on the right to see what's included in each plan.
translation.catalog-access-feature-tool-access-descr: Access to our collection of artisanal apps. Single tool licenses grant lifetime access to one tool, while memberships unlock everything.
translation.catalog-access-feature-updates-descripti: All tools receive regular updates. All licenses include updates for the purchased tool, while memberships get also new tools automatically.
translation.catalog-access-feature-release-notes-des: Stay informed about updates. Members receive private release notes with detailed information about new features and improvements.
translation.catalog-access-development-influence-des: Supporter tier members can vote on new features and improvements, propose their own features to any tool, and also vote on what the next app should be created when there's no commission and time is available. Help shape the future of our catalog.
translation.catalog-access-feature-community-impact-: Your support directly contributes to making our tools accessible to as many people as possible. This includes funding accessibility improvements, supporting users with financial constraints, and ensuring our artisanal development reaches everyone who needs it.
translation.catalog-access-feature-trial-description: Try all tools risk-free before committing. Subscription tiers include a free trial period to explore the catalog.
translation.catalog-access-faq-link-description: Have questions about catalog access, subscriptions, or tool licenses? We've got you covered‚Äîvisit our comprehensive FAQ page for detailed answers, or reach out if you need more help.
translation.catalog-access-toggle-aria-monthly-yearl: Toggle between monthly and yearly pricing
translation.catalog-access-toggle-aria-individual-fa: Toggle between individual and family pricing
